title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 105.1 - General information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 105.1 - General information

State Regulations
A foreign banking corporation maintaining a New York

State-licensed branch, agency or representative office that proposes to change
its manager, deputy manager, representative or individual designated to receive
process, shall submit a letter to the superintendent indicating the name(s) of
the individual(s) to whom such change is being made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
105.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
